txt.en: 'Bless Captain Brackenbrook, if not for him where would we be now?'
'The old Archet is a thing of the past! The new Archet will be the jewel of Bree-land.'
'We should raise a statue to Captain Brackenbrook, and that son of his is cut from the same rock, as well!'
'All those people running to Combe are going to be back once we've rebuilt bigger and better.'
